Constructor.

Parameters:
server Pointer to a server object.
clientId ID of the corresponding client.
ftpSocket Smart pointer to the socket used by that client.
offset Offset where the transfer should start from.
running Whether the transfer should start immediately or not.
blockLength The size of one transfer block in bytes which shall be used for transferring large files.
